name: h3-node
description: H3 Bindings to node using N-API

scripts.prebuild: bash -c "npm run clean && git clone https://github.com/uber/h3 && cd h3 && git checkout v3.4.0 && if command -v make; then cmake . -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC && make; else echo $PATH && cmake . && msbuild.exe ALL_BUILD.vcxproj && lstree; fi && cd .. && prebuildify --target=node@`node --version | sed s/v//`"
scripts.install: bash -c "if node-gyp-build-test; then node-gyp-build; else npm run prebuild && node-gyp-build; fi"

author: David Ellis <isv.damocles@gmail.com>
